NFT Collection Module

Methods

Interact with the NFT module of the app

class thirdweb.modules.nft.NftModule(address: str, client: thirdweb_web3.main.Web3)

NFT Methods

Initializing the class attributes

address: str

NFT module contract address [https://thirdweb.com/: Dashboard: Project ➝ NFT Module]

mint(arg: thirdweb.types.nft.MintArg) → thirdweb.types.nft.NftMetadata

Mints a new token to the signer.

Parameters

arg – The mint parameters

Returns

The NftMetadata(name,description,image,properties,id,uri) *Preferrably, using a link

mint_to(to_address: str, arg: thirdweb.types.nft.MintArg) → thirdweb.types.nft.NftMetadata

Mints a new token to an address - Arguments passed: to_address and a class -> MintArg(name, description, image_uri, properties) - Returns the NftMetadata(name,description,image,properties,id,uri) *Preferrably, using a link

total_supply() → int

Returns the total supply

get(token_id: int) → thirdweb.types.nft.NftMetadata

Returns the Metadata of a token

mint_batch(args: List[thirdweb.types.nft.MintArg])

Mints a batch of tokens to the signer address

mint_batch_to(to_address: str, args: List[thirdweb.types.nft.MintArg])

Mints a batch of tokens to the given address

burn(token_id: int)

Burns a given token

transfer_from(from_address: str, to_address: str, token_id: int)

Transfers a token from one address to another

transfer(to_address: str, token_id: int)

Transfers NFT from the current signers wallet to another wallet

set_royalty_bps(amount: int)

Sets the royalty percentage for the NFT

get_all() → List[thirdweb.types.nft.NftMetadata]

Returns all the NFTs in the system

get_owned(address: str = '') → List[thirdweb.types.nft.NftMetadata]

Defaults to fetching the NFTs owned by the current signer (as indicated by the private key) if the address parameter is not supplied

Parameters

address – The address to fetch the NFTs for.

Returns

A list of NFTs owned by the given address

balance() → int

Returns balance of the current signers wallet - Use-case: Use this method if you want to use the currently connected wallet - Dashboard: Project ➝ NFT Module ➝ Total amount of NFT’s :return: The balance of the current signers wallet

balance_of(address: str) → int

Returns balance of the given addressss - Use-case: Use this method if you don’t want to use the connected wallet, but want to check another wallet. - Dashboard: Project ➝ NFT Module ➝ Total amount of NFT’s :param address: The address to fetch the NFTs for. :return: The balance of the given address

owner_of(token_id: int) → str

Returns the owner of the given token :param token_id: The token id to fetch the owner for. :return: The owner of the given token

get_metadata(token_id: int) → thirdweb.types.nft.NftMetadata

Returns the metadata of the given token :param token_id: The token id to fetch the metadata for. :return: The metadata of the given token

is_approved(address: str, operator: str) → bool

Returns whether the given address is approved :param address: The address to check :param operator: The operator to check :return: Whether the given address is approved

set_approval(operator: str, approved: bool = True)

Sets approval for specified operator, defaults to grant approval :param operator: The operator to set approval for :param approved: Whether to grant approval or revoke it

set_restricted_transfer(restricted: bool = True)

Sets restricted transfer for the NFT, defaults to restricted. :param restricted: Whether to grant restricted transfer or revoke it

get_with_owner(token_id: int, owner: str)

Returns the NFT with the given token id and owner :param token_id: The token id to fetch the NFT for :param owner: The owner of the NFT :return: The NFT with the given token id and owner

set_module_metadata(metadata: str)

Sets the metadata for the module :param metadata: The metadata to set

get_abi_module() → thirdweb.abi.nft.NFT

Types

class thirdweb.types.nft.MintArg(name: str, description: str = '', image: Union[str, bytes, bytearray] = '', properties: Optional[dict] = None, image_uri: str = '')

The name of the NFT being minted

name: str

Short description of the NFT (optional)

description: str = ''

Either an image URI or a bytes/bytesarray object.

If the property is a bytes/bytesarray object, it’ll be uploaded to the default storage provider and the uri will replace this properties value.

image: Union[str, bytes, bytearray] = ''
properties: Optional[dict] = None

Deprecated since version 0.4.0: This property is deprecated. Use the image property instead

image_uri: str = ''
